title: Software Engineer
description: Collaborated with four cross-functional teams on a major banking initiative, mentoring two interns and driving timely feature delivery through Agile and Scrum practices.
Built and launched three responsive web portals using Spring MVC and ReactJS, delivering dynamic user experiences that improved customer engagement metrics.
Developed RESTful APIs with Java 21 and Spring Boot, integrating Hibernate with SQL and MongoDB databases for high-performance real-time data operations.
Maintained eight microservice codebases using Git and Bitbucket, integrating Apache Kafka for asynchronous event streaming to enhance system reliability.
Configured Tomcat servers and automated deployments via Jenkins CI/CD pipelines, reducing release time by 25% across six projects.
Validated over thirty APIs through Postman and strengthened automated testing with JUnit, improving bug detection efficiency by 95%.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Developed and maintained full-stack web applications that automated student request workflows for UMKC departments, reducing processing time by 30%.
Built modular React and Node.js components with SQL backends, improving data accuracy by 25% and enhancing the reliability of internal systems.
Implemented CI/CD automation and Docker-based containerization, cutting deployment times from hours to minutes.
Partnered with cross-functional teams to design analytics dashboards that delivered real-time insights into departmental performance, boosting data-driven decision-making by 40%.

title: Software Engineer
description: Delivered over 15 scalable warehouse management web pages using ReactJS and Spring Boot, accelerating development cycles by 30% through effective Agile collaboration and Jenkins automation.
Migrated more than 35 legacy AngularJS components to Vue.js, enhancing load times by 40% while cutting maintenance overhead by 25%, resulting in a seamless user experience.
Developed reusable UI components using Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap to ensure design consistency while reducing feature delivery timelines by an average of two weeks across multiple projects.
Created RESTful APIs for inventory and stock management systems that improved response times by 35% while ensuring real-time data accuracy for efficient warehouse operations.
Enhanced CI/CD pipelines by integrating automated build validation and static code analysis tools, increasing deployment reliability and reducing rollback incidents during production releases.

title: Software Developer
description: Developed and maintained dynamic web applications using AngularJS and Spring Boot, achieving a 25% improvement in application load times through effective debugging and performance enhancements.

Built reusable UI components with AngularJS and Bootstrap that streamlined design consistency across multiple projects while reducing front-end development time by 30% through efficient coding practices.
Collaborated with senior engineers to integrate RESTful APIs, enhancing deployment reliability by 40% through the implementation of Jenkins CI/CD pipelines and Docker containerization.
Actively participated in Agile sprints and code reviews to foster a collaborative team environment while improving software delivery speed by 20% through iterative feedback loops.
